item.title: Adding simplebackups.io
item.description: https://simplebackups.io/) — Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, Backblaze... - Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, Backblaze...). Provides free plan for 1 backup.

item.title: added lambda store
item.description: https://lambda.store/ - Serverless Redis with free tier up to 5000 requests per day and 256MB max database size

item.title: Removed fast.io
item.description: https://github.com/tvvocold/FOSS-for-Dev - FOSS for Dev](https://github.com/tvvocold/FOSS-for-Dev) — A hub of free and Open Source software for developers

item.title: Added 3Cols to Tools for Teams and Collaboration section
item.description: https://3cols.com/ - A free cloud based code snippet manager for personal and collaborative code.

item.title: Sort CMS section alphabetically
item.description:
https://www.cosmicjs.com/ - Headless CMS and API toolkit. Free personal plans for developers.
https://crystallize.com - Headless PIM with ecommerce support. Built-in GraphQL API. Free version includes unlimited users, 1000 catalogue items, 5 GB/month bandwidth and 25k/month API calls.
https://forestry.io/ - Headless CMS. Give your editors the power of Git. Create and edit Markdown-based content with ease. Comes with three free sites that includes 3 editors, Instant Previews. Integrates with blogs hosted on Netlify/GitHubpages/ elsewhere
https://www.kontent.ai - A Content-as-a-Service platform that gives you all the headless CMS benefits while empowering marketers at the same time. Developer plan provides 2 users with unlimited projects with 2 environments for each, 500 content items, 2 languages with Delivery and Management API, and Custom elements support. Larger plans available to meet your needs.

item.title: Added Codefactor to Code Quality section
item.description: https://www.codefactor.io - Automated Code Review for Git. Free version includes unlimited users, unlimited public repositories and 1 private repo.

item.title: Added Crystallize to CMS section
item.description: https://crystallize.com - Headless PIM with ecommerce support. Built-in GraphQL API. Free version includes unlimited users, 1000 catalogue items, 5 GB/month bandwidth and 25k/month API calls.
